timeline.message:
Claiming & AreaSelectionUtil Fix Up.

- Area selection util was also determining if something could be
claimed, while it should have only been getting a shape of WorldCoords.
- Remove a pile of redundant stuff in the claiming code.
- Actually filter radius claims going too close to homeblocks.

TODO: final testing.

Claiming & AreaSelectionUtil Fix Up.

- Fix up plot fs and nfs area selections.

Claiming & AreaSelectionUtil Fix Up.

- Add and fix comments.
- Make /plot nfs not work on PlotGroups and make use of unused language
string.

Claiming & AreaSelectionUtil Fix Up.

- Make /t claim rect # adjust to a lower radius when there's not enough
townblocks available.
- Results in a centered rectangle instead of claims being made primarily
in the upper left corner.
- Closes #4395.

Claiming & AreaSelectionUtil Fix Up.

- More comments, more tweaking to area claiming selection process.
  - The /t claim rect|circle # commands should both make perfect rings,
with no half-made rings of claims. (Either a perfect square or circle.)
